string.text: Hide and seek: keep a low profile
If I don’t stay quiet, Stronglav will spot us.
Hide and seek: speak to Markus
Stronglav is gone. I should let Markus know what happened.
Desperate decisions: kill the bloodsuckers
Stronglav is gone, and a pack of bloodsuckers has appeared in its place. We have to clear them out to get past them.
Desperate decisions: talk to Markus
I should speak to Markus.
Exit: find a way out of the cavern
I have to find a way out of this cavern.
Laboratory X7: find Savage
The Monolith soldier I interrogated claimed that Savage was taken into the laboratory. He should be somewhere around here.
Laboratory X7: speak to Savage
I’ve found Savage’s PDA signal. Now I just have to find him and talk to him.
Nightmare: find a way out of laboratory X7
I’ll just be another skeleton littering the floors of this cursed lab if I don’t get the hell out of here. I need to find an exit of some kind.
Nightmare: prepare and detonate explosives to block the passage
Stronglav is still after me. I need to set and detonate explosives in this room to block the passage and trap him inside.
Nightmare: evacuation
The explosives are ready. It’s time to get the hell out of here!
Nightmare: investigation
The ladder has led me to a strange station of some kind. I should investigate this place.
